root.title: Suspicious SQL Error Messages
root.description: Detects SQL error messages that indicate probing for an injection attack
root.author: Bjoern Kimminich

logsource.definition: Requirements: application error logs must be collected (with LOG_LEVEL ERROR and above)

keywords.item: You have an error in your SQL syntax
SELECTs to the left and right of UNION do not have the same number of result columns

falsepositives.item: A syntax error in MySQL also occurs in non-dynamic (safe) queries if there is an empty in() clause, that may often be the case.
